definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
Greymouth, town in New Zealand/also written 格雷默斯[Ge2 lei2 mo4 si1]
Charles Grey (1764-1845), prime minister of the United Kingdom 1830-34

pinyin: Ge2 lei2 Shi4 Jie3 pou1 xue2

sentences.english: Figueres thanked the crowd for their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 费格雷斯对群众的热情表示感激。

sentences.english: Seventy-five years after Mrs. Graham's cat fell into the freezer.
sentences.chinese: 在格雷厄姆太太的猫掉进冰柜七十五年之后。

sentences.english: Gray was born in Canton, Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 格雷出生在俄亥俄的坎顿。

sentences.english: Meet Grady, a twenty-nine year old construction worker.
sentences.chinese: 米特格雷迪，一个二十九岁的建筑工人。

sentences.english: He inherited Flor on first coming to the St. Gregory.
sentences.chinese: 他一到圣格雷戈里饭店就留用了弗洛拉。

sentences.english: With everything she needed bought, Grace took a taxi home.
sentences.chinese: 所需求的都买好后，格雷斯打的回家了。

sentences.english: Gladys Linch died a week ago.
sentences.chinese: 格雷迪斯一个星期之前死了。

sentences.english: Graham joined the army to get away from a boring job.
sentences.chinese: 格雷厄姆参军以逃脱烦闷的工作。

sentences.english: The CD also includes three original pieces written by Jennifer Grady.
sentences.chinese: 该光盘还包括詹妮弗格雷迪写了三首原创作品。

sentences.english: Abe and Babe will grab a grub from Greg.
sentences.chinese: 阿贝和贝比将从格雷格那儿抓幼虫。

sentences.english: Grace tried on dresses over her shorts and tank top .
sentences.chinese: 格雷斯试穿婚纱时仅穿著短裤和背心。

sentences.english: When Lincoln and Sucre arrive at the pier, Gretchen and Self are gone.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和苏克雷赶到码头，格雷琴和赛尔夫已经离开了。

sentences.english: I did not fully appreciate the beauty of Grahame's words.
sentences.chinese: 那时，我还不能完全领略格雷厄姆的文字之美。

sentences.english: Gregor was rumored to be discontented and having affairs.
sentences.chinese: 传闻格雷戈尔对她不满，有了外遇。

sentences.english: Losing money, as Graham noted, can also be psychologically unsettling.
sentences.chinese: 亏钱，如格雷厄姆所释，也能从心理上动摇军心。

sentences.english: Forty-four-year-old Gray certainly lives an extraordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 44岁的格雷当然过着一种特别的生活。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
